usage_instructions.description: This file contains 20 test queries across three complexity levels (easy, medium, hard) covering various categories of questions.
testing_approach: Start with easy queries to verify basic retrieval works
Progress to medium queries to test cross-section synthesis
Use hard queries to evaluate multi-hop reasoning and nuanced understanding
Check citation quality across all complexity levels
Verify confidence scores correlate with retrieval quality

expected_outcomes.easy: High confidence (0.8-1.0), clear citations, direct answers
expected_outcomes.medium: Moderate-high confidence (0.6-0.9), multiple sources, synthesized answers
expected_outcomes.hard: Moderate confidence (0.5-0.8), complex reasoning, may require multiple papers
